summary: Created keyboardShortcuts.svelte.ts store with localStorage persistence
Added shortcut badge to CommandCard showing assigned keyboard shortcuts
Added shortcut input field to CommandEditor with format validation
Updated +layout.svelte to check user-defined shortcuts before built-in shortcuts
Removed hardcoded Alt+C for /jat:complete (now configurable via UI)

suggestedTasks.title: Add default keyboard shortcuts for common commands
suggestedTasks.description: Pre-populate shortcuts for /jat:complete (Alt+C), /jat:start (Alt+S), etc. Users can override.
suggestedTasks.reason: Users currently have to manually assign shortcuts - defaults would improve UX

suggestedTasks.title: Add keyboard shortcut cheat sheet modal
suggestedTasks.description: Show all assigned shortcuts in a modal (e.g., via ? key) for quick reference
suggestedTasks.reason: Discoverability - users may forget what shortcuts they assigned

patterns: Keyboard shortcuts stored in localStorage under key command-keyboard-shortcuts
Use findMatchingCommand(event) to check if a keyboard event matches any user shortcut
Shortcut format: Alt+C, Ctrl+Shift+S, Meta+Enter (normalized on save)
gotchas: User shortcuts skip Shift variants (!event.shiftKey) to avoid conflict with Alt+Shift+C (copy session)
Shortcuts must have at least one modifier key (Alt, Ctrl, or Meta)
